system.description:
You can walk through a space an enemy unit occupies. To use this maneuver you have to stand next to the enemy you want to walk through, then enter their space and afterwards enter a free space next to the enemy, all this movement is already included in the maneuver cost and you don’t have to spend extra MP . Doing this however provokes an Opportunity Attack from the enemy regardless if you end your turn still inside their reach. Alternatively instead of entering a free space after entering into the enemies space you can choose to use this maneuver again.

Pushing extra cost: 4 [MP]

You now don’t provoke an Opportunity Attack from the target but leaving their reach still provokes it as normal.
